attributes.review: as soon as i opened this app, i expected a nice app to keep me updated, instead, there was page after page of trumps n*des. unacceptable. on top of this, after i allowed them to use my location, they drove to my house and threw a brick in my window. i am unsure who i will be voting for in this election now.

attributes.title: Wanted a BRILLIANT app... didn’t get it.
attributes.review: I am a HUGE Trump supporter and I expected this to be the BEST app.... an app that nobody else could compete with. The GREATEST app to ever exist. Unfortunately it just wasn’t. I think Obama did better....
